name: Piggy's Hungry Day
description:
You are a hungry pig that wants to eat everything you can get your trotters on! Tap on your phone to move around, you have one minute to eat as much as possible! Wheat is worth one point, red mushrooms are two points, and purple flowers are three points. Cactus are negative one points. Do not forget to use your gold at the end to buy irl gems!

"Click Run-Game to Start"
